item.description:
Join us and the rest of Things To Do Boston crew and learn the basics of Salsa dancing. This is a great opportunity for beginning to intermediate dancers to socialize, get in shape, and learn to dance.

In this class you will work on:

Basic Techniques
Foot work
Leading
Following
Spinning
Partner Dancing
Individual Dancing

You will also work on integrating these techniques into other partner dances. No need to bring a partner, but feel free to do so if you'd like.

About the instructor: Jonathan Zapata is a certified ballroom dance instructor and competes in professional ballroom competitions around the New England area and the nation. Combining his ballroom technique with his salsa origin, JZ has created a smooth, unique, and sassy style of salsa catching the eye of everyone anytime he steps onto any dance floor.

Also, with enough interest from our attendees we can decide on a venue after the class to socialize with your fellow dance partners (optional).
item.name: Learn to Dance Salsa : Basic Steps for Beginners
